thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Fleetcor Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $3.05

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Fleetcor Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $3.05
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Fleetcor Technologies Inc:
* FLEETCOR REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL-YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.42 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $3.05 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 18.5 PERCENT TO $610 MILLION * SEES Q1 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.30 TO $2.40 * SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $10.05 TO $10.35
* SEES FY 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $7.40 TO $7.70 * SEES TOTAL REVENUES BETWEEN $2,490 MILLION AND $2,550 MILLION FOR 2018
* SEES ADJUSTED REVENUES TO BE BETWEEN $2,370 MILLION AND $2,430 MILLION FOR 2018
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.33, REVENUE VIEW $604.9 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.34 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $10.16, REVENUE VIEW $2.54 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
